articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag is preparing for Saturday's FA Cup final not knowing whether reports he will be sacked are true.
articles.title: Erik Ten Hag sack rumours: Manchester United manager prepares for FA Cup final amid reports of firing

articles.description: Sunrisers Hyderabad cruise into the final of the Indian Premier League with a comfortable 36-run win over Rajasthan Royals.
articles.title: Indian Premier League: Heinrich Klaasen & Shahbaz Ahmed help Sunrisers Hyderabad beat Rajasthan Royals to reach final

articles.description: Ferrari’s Charles Leclerc sets the pace ahead of Lewis Hamilton in Friday practice at the Monaco Grand Prix.
articles.title: Charles Leclerc tops Monaco Grand Prix second practice

articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag's future is a huge talking point in the build-up to the 2024 FA Cup final while Manchester City will be chasing more history.
articles.title: 2024 FA Cup final preview: Erik ten Hag's future in the spotlight as Man Utd meet Man City

articles.description: Barcelona sack manager Xavi with former Bayern Munich boss Hansi Flick set to replace him.
articles.title: Barcelona sack Xavi with Hansi Flick set to replace him

articles.description: Crystal Palace co-owner John Textor wants to sell his majority stake in the club - and has an interest in buying Everton.
articles.title: John Textor: Crystal Palace co-owner selling stake and monitoring Everton

articles.description: Moeen Ali says he is ready to lead England at the T20 World Cup if Jos Buttler misses part of the tournament on paternity leave.
articles.title: Moeen Ali ready to lead England at T20 World Cup if Jos Buttler is absent

articles.description: Holders Barcelona meet eight-time winners Lyon in Saturday's Women's Champions League final, in a meeting of Europe's titans.
articles.title: Women's Champions League final: Barcelona v Lyon preview

articles.description: Novak Djokovic's final preparation for the French Open ends after defeat in the Geneva Open semi-finals to Czech world number 44 Tomas Machac.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Novak Djokovic loses to Tomas Machac in Geneva warm-up

articles.description: British World champion Josh Kerr says he is only focused on winning, not other athletes, as Olympic 1500m champion Jakob Ingebrigtsen says their rivalry is “good for the sport”.
articles.title: Diamond League: Josh Kerr & Jakob Ingebrigtsen rivalry 'good for the sport'
